name: Open-Faced Oysters
author: Kiska
summary: Perfect for date night. Serve with angel hair pasta and some roasted broccoli or kale for an elegant touch. Garnish with additional lime juice, hot sauce, or browned butter for extra decadent flavor.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package fresh mushrooms, finely chopped
20  freshly shucked oysters on the half shell
20 drops hot sauce, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Arrange oysters on a baking dish
Measure 1 tablespoon lime juice into a bowl; reserve
Combine mushrooms, cilantro, olive oil, green onions, lime juice, lime zest, and garlic in a bowl
Place a spoonful of the mixture over each oyster
Add a drop of hot sauce to each oyster
Drizzle reserved lime juice on top
Bake in the preheated oven until warmed through, 10 to 15 minutes
